channel.title: A few questions [317]
channel.description:
Ok, I'm using the pur3 pk ftw source (v1) right now as a base. I'm working on changing a couple of things, and I was wondering if somebody could tell me how to do a few things, or point me to a tutorial.
-Autocasting -Prayer -Defence actually working
I have actually used the search button, so no comments on that, please. I found loads of random stuff on prayer, mostly irrelevant topics. But on defence/autocasting, I couldn't find one result...

item.title: A few questions [317]
item.dc:creator: @iKillAssassins iKillAssassins
item.description:
@iKillAssassins wrote:

ziplock:

For the auto casting you could create a Boolean that defines if you are casting a spell or not and you could use a do-while statement to loop the casting method.

Well, I could probably do that, but how would I add the auto-casting interface to set the boolean to 1?

EDIT: Disregard what I said about being able to do that – I have no idea how to find the magic script or the interface, or where to add in a boolean value and a loop.

Read full topic

item.title: A few questions [317]
item.dc:creator: @ziplock ziplock
item.description:
@ziplock wrote:

[quote=“iKillAssassins, post:1, topic:255323”]Ok, I’m using the pur3 pk ftw source (v1) right now as a base. I’m working on changing a couple of things, and I was wondering if somebody could tell me how to do a few things, or point me to a tutorial.

-Autocasting
-Prayer
-Defence actually working

I have actually used the search button, so no comments on that, please. I found loads of random stuff on prayer, mostly irrelevant topics. But on defence/autocasting, I couldn’t find one result…[/quote]

For the auto casting you could create a Boolean that defines if you are casting a spell or not and you could use a do-while statement to loop the casting method.

Read full topic
